resources.string: Proud Partner : Comilla University IT Society
Are you sure you want to leave?

"রেডিও কুবি"/ " Radio Comilla University" is the only Campus Radio of Comilla University.This is an initiative of Comilla University IT Society (CoUITS) for making a true ICT sustained campus and building a better, connected community.After broadcasting several test episodes, Radio Comilla University went on its first on air program .Radio Comilla University earned its reputaion and achieved a place among everyones heart quickly.We are now taking new initiatives to connect more people with us.
